text: To (allaha) asa ahe ki jyane tumhala phakta eka jivapasuna nirmana kele ani tyacyadvare tyaci jodi banavali, yasathi ki tyane apalya tya jodidarapasuna sukha caina prapta karavi, maga patine patnisi javalika keli, tevha tila garbha rahila halakasa, maga ti tyala ghe'una calata phirata rahili. Jevha tila bhara janavu lagala, tevha pati-patni doghe allahasi, jo tyanca svami ahe, du'a (prarthana) karu lagale ki jara tu amhala sahisalamata (vyavasthita svarupata) santana pradana keli tara amhi khupa khupa abhara manu
